ml

Class Nd4jLinReg

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.MLModel
      • ml.Nd4jLinReg

  • public class Nd4jLinReg
extends MLModel
    Implements Linear Regression on the class MLModel with the Nd4j framework.
    Author:
    mwe

                 double length)
        Prints the cost for these theta values. Loss function 'mean squared error'.
        Parameters:

        labels - the INDArray of respective true values
        theta - the parameters for the linear regression line
        length - the number of features/values

        org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray gradientDescent(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray features,

        features - the INDArray of features
        labels - the INDArray of respective true values
        theta - the parameters for the linear regression line
        alpha - the step size
        iter - the number of iterations
        length - the number of features/values
        Returns:
        the INDArray of computed theta values
